body_html:
Good to know that. We are exactly trying to extend TF on our hardware platform, with primary focus on high performance, but also much care on usability and maintainability.

I will to take a closer look to the current code first, and see if I could come up with a tentative design. Glad to see the incoming changes :)

body:
Good to know that. We are exactly trying to extend TF on our hardware platform, with primary focus on high performance, but also much care on usability and maintainability.

I will to take a closer look to the current code first, and see if I could come up with a tentative design. Glad to see the incoming changes :)
